pullRequest.title: Web console autocompaction E2E test
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
Add an E2E test for the common case web console workflow of setting up autocompaction that changes the partitions from dynamic to hashed.
Also fix an issue with the async test setup to properly wait for the web console to be ready.

This PR has:

 been self-reviewed.
 added comments explaining the "why" and the intent of the code wherever would not be obvious for an unfamiliar reader.
 added integration tests.

commit.message:
Web console autocompaction E2E test

Add an E2E test for the common case web console workflow of setting up
autocompaction that changes the partitions from dynamic to hashed.

Also fix an issue with the async test setup to properly wait for the web
console to be ready.

nodes.bodyText: For reviewers: To disable headless mode, change createBrowserNormal to createBrowserDebug
